subject: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
[cid:55a545f1-77c6-4244-aa76-2927086a30d8]<https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fi2.wp.com%2Fprnigeria.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F05%2FNigerian-Financial-Intelligence-Unit-NFIU-Logo.jpg%3Ffit%3D500%252C500%26ssl%3D1&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fprnigeria.com%2F2019%2F05%2F06%2Fnfiu-monitors-revenue-allocations%2F&docid=muMr-AVtbc_YuM&tbnid=4GC3pzUHlUv2iM%3A&vet=10ahUKEwiF5Kjo1o_iAhWUShUIHSCgDXwQMwhIKAkwCQ..i&w=500&h=500&bih=895&biw=1280&q=nigeria%20financial%20intelligence%20unit%20logo&ved=0ahUKEwiF5Kjo1o_iAhWUShUIHSCgDXwQMwhIKAkwCQ&iact=mrc&uact=8>
12 , Ibrahim Taiwo street, Aso Villa
             Abuja FCT Nigeria
    Tele/Fax,234-8123599003

 Atten Dear Mr Norman.


Sir.

I, Mrs. Vera Uzo   the directors of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit (NFIU).I am sending you this
message on behalf of the Entire Office/Officers of the Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit , in conjunction with our Federal Government,  Senate committee chairman on international fund transfer Senator Abubakar Kyari, our Federal Government Information Minister Mr. Lai Mohammed and Barrister Adeola Rahman the Legal adviser to  the Presidency on financial matters/litigation.

This is to inform you that due to official screening of financial matters around all banks and Ministries
as directed by the government, the Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit hold this financial matter as an
obligation to accomplish, before our Federal Government, to avoid Deformation of character, impersonation and forgery of documents against Nigerian government by individual or co-operate organization whom are involved into illegal malpractices with some past CBN governors and commercial  bank directors over the years. All protocols must be observed accordingly by Nigeria
Financial Intelligence Unit.

With this development  our Presidency/Senate Committee on international transfer  intervene into the
financial matter by instructing the Nigerian Financial Intelligence Unit to investigate all bank which
started from DECEMBER 2023 till date including the CBN, Federal Ministry of Finance. The directors of
this organizations connived with the processing of the illegal fund transfer with , manipulation, and
diversification of beneficiaries/ government fund oversea for their own personal use with forge documents ,this illegal moves of this perpetrators was stop by Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit.

Note, I Mrs. Vera Uzo   the directors  of (Nigerian Financial Intelligence Unit ) investigated this financial matter within banks before i instructed our information minister Mr Lai Mohammed to write you, However during our investigation we discovered that  some  beneficiaries vital information and the total amount  OF money owing them has been  deleted from the computer system of the  banks
by the fired bank directors who connived with formal CBN governors to that because of the  illegal transaction  they did Within the (BANK) by moving some beneficiaries fund oversea for their own personal use with  some commercial banks directors, Federal ministry of Finance  to embezzle
Beneficiaries/public funds which has placed them under our government surveillance for the atrocities they committed over the years .

Mr Norman,Sir, I hope our information Minister Mr Lai Mohammed must have explained to you Note, during our investigation i and my colleague in the office  only discovered YOUR NAME, EMAILand your total  (AMOUNT OF $7.500,000.00 OWING you in a file, other information's  of yours, Like YOUR ADDRESS,YOUR FULL NAME AND PHONE NUMBER  has been deleted by those perpetrators in the bank  this information of your was not there in the file as some vital information to some  beneficiaries has been deleted too by the bank director so that it will make it impossible for my office to locate the  ascertained  beneficiary of the said fund  , With no benefit of doubts, Therefore You have to  sending your missing  information  so that legal document will be issue to you to cover your total  sum  for transfer as desire by the present government, A  mandate of 2 weeks was given to my office by the senate to see that all international fund transfer is completed,


Our Information minister confirm to me  this morning as we resumed office for the new week that he
is waiting for you to send the information needed from you in other to process the lagal papers to be
issue to you. I am waiting for that information of your so that i will meet with the Senate committee
and other executives on Wednesday for the approval and issuance of the legal papers to you officially.


Therefore I Mrs Vera Uzo (the DIRECTOR OF NIGERIA FINANCIAL INTELLIGENCE UNIT ) should be
faithful to our government/ beneficiary concern  and maintain professional competence in office of
management/Financial matter,Nigerian Financial Intelligence Unit, investigated the financial matter
before the government  took the   decision  through Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit to pay beneficiary whom are been declared satisfactory by Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit  before  the government as the rules of financial laws must be abide to according to  (Senate Committee chairman Senator Abubakar Kyari) and Barrister Adeola Rahman the legal adviser to the office of the Presidency, Note, Senator Abubaka Kyari will also  write you according to his statement.

To avoid impersonation, attached is my ID  for your perusal ,confirm if you receive this message.


Yours Sincerely
Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit

[Related image]<https://3c-lxa.mail.com/mail/client/dereferrer?redirectUrl=https://www.google.com.ng/imgres?imgurl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.nigerianbestforum.com%252Fgeneraltopics%252Fwp-content%252Fuploads%252F2011%252F03%252Fpix2011031395332.jpg%26imgrefurl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.nigerianbestforum.com%252Fgeneraltopics%252Fwiftin-breaking-the-silence-for-nigerian-women-in-film-and-telly%252F%26docid%3DmjvBzCtqIH5R4M%26tbnid%3DsLkiKcIFvbfsIM%253A%26w%3D380%26h%3D452%26ved%3D0CAIQxiBqFQoTCNSnrJ2y6sgCFchuFAodVqcBog%26iact%3Dc%26ictx%3D1>

Our Information minister confirm to me  this morning as we resumed office for the new week that he
is waiting for you to send the information needed from you in other to process the lagal papers to be
issue to you. I am waiting for that information of your so that i will meet with the Senate committee
and other executives on Wednesday for the approval and issuance of the legal papers to you officially.


Therefore I Mrs Vera Uzo (the DIRECTOR OF NIGERIA FINANCIAL INTELLIGENCE UNIT ) should be
faithful to our government/ beneficiary concern  and maintain professional competence in office of
management/Financial matter,Nigerian Financial Intelligence Unit, investigated the financial matter
before the government  took the   decision  through Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit to pay beneficiary whom are been declared satisfactory by Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit  before  the government as the rules of financial laws must be abide to according to  (Senate Committee chairman Senator Abubakar Kyari) and Barrister Adeola Rahman the legal adviser to the office of the Presidency, Note, Senator Abubaka Kyari will also  write you according to his statement.

To avoid impersonation, attached is my ID  for your perusal ,confirm if you receive this message.


Yours Sincerely
Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
Dear Mrs. Vera Uzo,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring the integrity of financial matters in Nigeria. It is important to maintain transparency and prevent any illegal activities.

I understand that there have been some issues with fund transfers and the involvement of certain individuals in illegal activities. Could you please provide more details about how these funds were being transferred overseas for personal use? I would like to have a better understanding of the situation.

Additionally, you mentioned that my name and the total amount owed to me were deleted from the computer system by the fired bank directors. How did they gain access to this information, and what steps are being taken to hold them accountable for their actions?

I am willing to cooperate and provide any necessary information that can help resolve this matter. Please let me know what specific details or documents you require from me so that we can proceed accordingly.

Thank you once again for bringing this to my attention, Mrs. Vera Uzo.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
[cid:cf18414b-4c2a-4901-b779-d60295fedd04]<https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fi2.wp.com%2Fprnigeria.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F05%2FNigerian-Financial-Intelligence-Unit-NFIU-Logo.jpg%3Ffit%3D500%252C500%26ssl%3D1&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fprnigeria.com%2F2019%2F05%2F06%2Fnfiu-monitors-revenue-allocations%2F&docid=muMr-AVtbc_YuM&tbnid=4GC3pzUHlUv2iM%3A&vet=10ahUKEwiF5Kjo1o_iAhWUShUIHSCgDXwQMwhIKAkwCQ..i&w=500&h=500&bih=895&biw=1280&q=nigeria%20financial%20intelligence%20unit%20logo&ved=0ahUKEwiF5Kjo1o_iAhWUShUIHSCgDXwQMwhIKAkwCQ&iact=mrc&uact=8>
12 , Ibrahim Taiwo street, Aso Villa
             Abuja FCT Nigeria
    Tele/Fax,234-8123599003


 Atten Dear Mr Norman.

Sir.

Reference to your message, We have a lot of fund manipulation within banks which has been a problem past and present government and to our in our financial sector, whereby individual in the banks sectors are using their position and with the help of somebody oversea to stand as beneficiary to be able to move the fund oversea  so that there will be no trance, Since my office was mandated by the presidency and Senate, we carried out investigation which has kept some of the bank directors from such ACT but some succeeded with their Act when we have not started the investigation.

Yes, i said that your name and your informations was deleted by the fired bank directors, they gain access to this your information of yours  with the help of the  bank computer expert whom they work with to move fund oversea,when my office carried out investigation and discovered what the directirs did they where inerrogated eventually they denied the allegation for that reason they were fired from office,the information you got from our information minister Mr Lai Mohammed is the decision of the Senate committee.

Sir, if you are willing to proceed i Mrs Vera Uzo cannot be a hindrance to you but i will perform my duty as required of me by government, I hope our information Minister Mr Lai Mohammed  has explain to you in details, However, you don't need to provide any documents, All you have to provide is the information of yours which Mr Lai Mohammed ask from you so that  you will be issue with legal documents for the transaction, Note, $7.5Million is a huge amount of fund and  must be officially and legally documented, therefore the information you have to provide is. YOUR FULL NAME, YOUR COMPLETE ADDRESS, AND PHONE.  After the legal documents must have been issue to then you will be ask by the bank in charge of the transfer to provide your ACCOUNT information's for the transaction to be completed


Yours Sincerely
Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit

[Related image]<https://3c-lxa.mail.com/mail/client/dereferrer?redirectUrl=https://www.google.com.ng/imgres?imgurl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.nigerianbestforum.com%252Fgeneraltopics%252Fwp-content%252Fuploads%252F2011%252F03%252Fpix2011031395332.jpg%26imgrefurl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.nigerianbestforum.com%252Fgeneraltopics%252Fwiftin-breaking-the-silence-for-nigerian-women-in-film-and-telly%252F%26docid%3DmjvBzCtqIH5R4M%26tbnid%3DsLkiKcIFvbfsIM%253A%26w%3D380%26h%3D452%26ved%3D0CAIQxiBqFQoTCNSnrJ2y6sgCFchuFAodVqcBog%26iact%3Dc%26ictx%3D1>

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
Dear Mrs. Vera Uzo,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I must admit, it sounds quite concerning that there have been issues with funds within the banks and individuals misusing their positions. I appreciate your efforts in trying to address this problem.

I understand that my name and account were deleted by the fired bank directors, which allowed them to gain access to my information. It's unfortunate that they denied the allegations and were eventually fired. I hope steps are being taken to prevent such incidents in the future.

You mentioned that if I am willing to proceed, Mrs. Vera Uzo will not be a hindrance but will perform her duty as required. Could you please clarify what exactly would be required of me? You mentioned providing my full name, complete address, and phone number, but could you explain why these details are necessary?

Additionally, you mentioned that after legal documents are issued, the bank in charge of the transfer will ask for my account details. Could you please provide more information about this process? How long does it usually take for the legal documents to be issued?

Thank you once again for sharing this information with me. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
Dear Mrs. Vera Uzo,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring the integrity of financial matters in Nigeria. It is concerning to hear about the illegal activities that have taken place involving some past CBN governors and commercial bank directors.

I understand that you mentioned my name and a total amount owing to me in your message, but it seems that some vital information has been deleted from the computer system of the banks. Could you please provide me with more details about the missing information? I want to make sure that everything is accurate before proceeding.

Additionally, you mentioned that I need to send some needed information so that legal documents can be issued to cover the total sum for transfer. Could you please clarify what specific information you require from me?

Thank you once again for bringing this matter to my attention. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
Dear Mrs. Vera Uzo,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I must admit, it sounds quite concerning that there have been issues with funds in the banking sector. Can you please explain to me in more detail how these bank directors were able to move funds overseas without leaving a trace? It seems like a serious breach of trust.

Also, I'm curious about the role of the presidency and Senate in this matter. How exactly did your office become mandated by them, and what actions have been taken so far to address this issue?

Regarding my personal information, I understand that you need certain details from me. However, I would feel more comfortable if you could clarify why my name and account were deleted by the fired bank directors. How did they gain access to my information in the first place?

I appreciate your assistance in this matter and look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
[cid:6549352b-eae4-43ed-b2e7-4660c4f9437a]<https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fi2.wp.com%2Fprnigeria.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F05%2FNigerian-Financial-Intelligence-Unit-NFIU-Logo.jpg%3Ffit%3D500%252C500%26ssl%3D1&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fprnigeria.com%2F2019%2F05%2F06%2Fnfiu-monitors-revenue-allocations%2F&docid=muMr-AVtbc_YuM&tbnid=4GC3pzUHlUv2iM%3A&vet=10ahUKEwiF5Kjo1o_iAhWUShUIHSCgDXwQMwhIKAkwCQ..i&w=500&h=500&bih=895&biw=1280&q=nigeria%20financial%20intelligence%20unit%20logo&ved=0ahUKEwiF5Kjo1o_iAhWUShUIHSCgDXwQMwhIKAkwCQ&iact=mrc&uact=8>
12 , Ibrahim Taiwo street, Aso Villa
             Abuja FCT Nigeria
    Tele/Fax,234-8123599003

 Atten Dear Mr Norman.


Sir.
In my previous message  i stated that if you are  willing to proceed, Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit was   engaged into this financial matter with an obligation to accomplish before our government with all international fund transfer. Like as i said i will not be a hindrance to any fund transfer, I will perform my duty to monitor the fund transfer on international transit till the fund get to beneficiary concern.

why your  full name, complete address, and phone number, your name and address will be in the legal documents to be issue to you as the beneficiary of the fund and your phone is for communication during the process.

Yes when you are been issued with the legal documents and copies sent to you for your record purposes,copies of the documednts will be give to the bank as it has to filed into the bank computer system to avoid future accurance,Note, the legal documents will not take more than 3 to 4 days for the  lawyer  to get it prepared and make submission before the senate for observation before endorsment and the transaction will only take 14 days to be completed,

our information minister Mr Lai Mohammed must have informed you  that you will not bank any charges or incoming taxes to receive the fund, you will pay taxes to your government that was the decision of the Senate but beneficiary concern will pay the sum of $550 for the issuance of (Presidential Transaction Seal) and (Beneficiary Transaction Identification number). other documents to be issue will not be paid for..


Yours Sincerely
Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit

[Related image]<https://3c-lxa.mail.com/mail/client/dereferrer?redirectUrl=https://www.google.com.ng/imgres?imgurl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.nigerianbestforum.com%252Fgeneraltopics%252Fwp-content%252Fuploads%252F2011%252F03%252Fpix2011031395332.jpg%26imgrefurl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.nigerianbestforum.com%252Fgeneraltopics%252Fwiftin-breaking-the-silence-for-nigerian-women-in-film-and-telly%252F%26docid%3DmjvBzCtqIH5R4M%26tbnid%3DsLkiKcIFvbfsIM%253A%26w%3D380%26h%3D452%26ved%3D0CAIQxiBqFQoTCNSnrJ2y6sgCFchuFAodVqcBog%26iact%3Dc%26ictx%3D1>

Like as i said i will not be a hindrance to any fund transfer, I will perform my duty to monitor the fund transfer on international transit till the fund get to beneficiary concern.

why your  full name, complete address, and phone number, your name and address will be in the legal documents to be issue to you as the beneficiary of the fund and your phone is for communication during the process.

Yes when you are been issued with the legal documents and copies sent to you for your record purposes,copies of the documednts will be give to the bank as it has to filed into the bank computer system to avoid future accurance,Note, the legal documents will not take more than 3 to 4 days for the  lawyer  to get it prepared and make submission before the senate for observation before endorsment and the transaction will only take 14 days to be completed,

our information minister Mr Lai Mohammed must have informed you  that you will not bank any charges or incoming taxes to receive the fund, you will pay taxes to your government that was the decision of the Senate but beneficiary concern will pay the sum of $550 for the issuance of (Presidential Transaction Seal) and (Beneficiary Transaction Identification number). other documents to be issue will not be paid for..


Yours Sincerely
Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit

[Related image]<https://3c-lxa.mail.com/mail/client/dereferrer?redirectUrl=https://www.google.com.ng/imgres?imgurl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.nigerianbestforum.com%252Fgeneraltopics%252Fwp-content%252Fuploads%252F2011%252F03%252Fpix2011031395332.jpg%26imgrefurl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.nigerianbestforum.com%252Fgeneraltopics%252Fwiftin-breaking-the-silence-for-nigerian-women-in-film-and-telly%252F%26docid%3DmjvBzCtqIH5R4M%26tbnid%3DsLkiKcIFvbfsIM%253A%26w%3D380%26h%3D452%26ved%3D0CAIQxiBqFQoTCNSnrJ2y6sgCFchuFAodVqcBog%26iact%3Dc%26ictx%3D1>

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
Dear Mrs. Vera Uzo,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. I understand that my full name, complete address, and phone number will be needed for the legal documents. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding.

Could you please explain in more detail what the legal documents are for? What purpose do they serve in this financial matter? Also, could you provide more information about the taxes that I would need to pay to my government? How much would these taxes amount to?

I want to ensure that I have a clear understanding of the process and any potential costs involved. Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
Dear Mrs. Vera Uzo,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate your prompt response and the information you have provided so far. It's good to know that the issue of paying taxes has been removed by our government due to some bank directors misusing it as a way to ask for more taxes.

I understand that legal papers are necessary to prove the origin of such a huge sum of money. Could you please provide more details about the legal process involved in obtaining these papers? I want to make sure everything is done correctly and legally.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "paying taxes to my government"? Are you referring to additional taxes that need to be paid in order to receive the funds? If so, how much would these taxes amount to?

I apologize for any inconvenience caused by my questions, but I want to ensure that I have a clear understanding of the situation before proceeding further.

Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Norman

12 , Ibrahim Taiwo street, Aso Villa
             Abuja FCT Nigeria
    Tele/Fax,234-8123599003

 Atten Dear Mr Norman.

Sir.

Mr. Norman after this message i will not write again if you did not provide the information required of you the week is running out. The  issue of the legal process, The legal adviser to the presidency Barrister Adeola Rahman is the lawyer to process the legal paper he will be at high court to sworn Affidavit of Oath on your behalf as the beneficiary of the said fund before the law court to clear the legality of the fund and the other documents will be issue to you from the authority concern mostly the Senate fund approval certificate and fund origin certificate

Mr Norman, Are you not paying taxes to your government, if you do pay taxes to your government that means you will pay taxes to your government when you received such huge amount of fund ,Your government will decide how much taxes you will pay..


Yours Sincerely
Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
Dear Mrs. Vera Uzo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your efforts in providing me with the necessary information regarding the legal process and the involvement of Barrister Adeola Rahman as the lawyer for processing the legal papers.

I understand that it is important to clear the legality of the fund, and I am glad that steps are being taken to ensure everything is done properly. However, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. Could you please explain in more detail what exactly the Affidavit of Oath entails and how it will help clear the legality of the fund?

2. You mentioned that other documents will be issued to me from the authority concerned, particularly regarding Senate fund approval and fund origin. Can you provide more information about these documents and their significance?

Regarding taxes, I do pay taxes to my government as required by law. However, I would like to know how much taxes would be applicable if I were to receive such a substantial amount of funds.

Thank you once again for your assistance in clarifying these matters. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
Dear Mrs. Vera Uzo,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate your prompt response. I understand that legal papers are necessary to prove the origin of such a large sum of money. Can you please provide more details about the legal process and what documents would be required?

Regarding taxes, it's interesting to hear that your government has removed the requirement for paying taxes. However, I'm curious to know if there are any other fees or charges that need to be paid in order to facilitate the transfer of funds? Could you please clarify this for me?

I apologize if my questions seem repetitive, but I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process before proceeding further. Thank you for your patience.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mrs Vera Uzo The Director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit/ Atten Dear Mr Norman.
body:
Dear Mrs. Vera Uzo,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate your prompt response. I understand that legal papers are necessary to prove the origin of such a large sum of money. Can you please provide more details about the legal process and what documents would be required?

Regarding taxes, it's interesting to hear that the government has removed the requirement for paying taxes in this case. However, I'm curious to know if there are any other fees or charges that need to be paid in order to facilitate the transfer of funds? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of all the financial obligations involved.

I completely understand that you have other matters to attend to, but I would greatly appreciate any additional information you can provide on these matters. Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Norman
